original_text: Some of the Jews believed Paul's message. They joined the group with Paul and Silas. A large number of Greek people who now worshipped God also joined this group. Many important women in the city also believed and they joined the group.
korean_text: 그 중의 어떤 사람 곧 경건한 헬라인의 큰 무리와 적지 않은 귀부인도 권함을 받고 바울과 실라를 따르나

sentences.original_text: Some of the Jews believed Paul's message.
They joined the group with Paul and Silas.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 바울과 실라와 함께 그 그룹에 합류했습니다.

sentences.original_text: A large number of Greek people
Many important women in the city
